snippet: The promoter, which owns Ticketmaster, reported $1.7 billion in revenue for the second quarter, with ticket sales up 26 percent from the year before.
lead_paragraph: The promoter, which owns Ticketmaster, reported $1.7 billion in revenue for the second quarter, with ticket sales up 26 percent from the year before.

headline.main: Strong Earnings for Live Nation in Concert Season
headline.print_headline:
Strong Earnings
